document.full_text: brownsville is the first texas city to ban plastic bags. not everyone is pleased with the policy, but the mayor says it has significantly reduced the trash in the city.
document.title: the texas tribune: mixed reviews for brownsville ban on plastic bags
lines_and_colors: brownsville is the first texas city to ban plastic bags. not everyone is pleased with the policy, but the mayor says it has significantly reduced the trash in the city.
